                                                  å› æ­¤ä½œè€…è£½ä½œäº†ä¸€å€‹ state knowledge base B\mathcal{B}B å»ç´€éŒ„ (s,apre,anext)(s, a_{\text{pre}}, a_{\text{next}})(s,apreâ€‹,anextâ€‹)ã€‚

                                                  B={(s,apre,anext)(i)}i=1âˆ£Bâˆ£ \mathcal{B} = \{ (s, a_{\text{pre}}, a_{\text{next}})^{(i)} \}_{i=1}^{|\mathcal{B}|} B={(s,apreâ€‹,anextâ€‹)(i)}i=1âˆ£Bâˆ£â€‹

                                                  • sss è¡¨ç¤º state knowledge
                                                  • apre=ata_{\text{pre}} = a_{t}apreâ€‹=atâ€‹

                                                  • âˆ£Bâˆ£|\mathcal{B}|âˆ£Bâˆ£ è¡¨ç¤º state knowledge base çš„å¤§å°

                                                  å¦‚æ­¤ä¸€ä¾†ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å°±å¯ä»¥æ›´å¥½åœ°é‹ç”¨ state knowledge äº†ï¼

                                                  # Model Training

                                                  æˆ‘å€‘ç¸½å…±æœƒæœ‰å…©å€‹æ¨¡å‹éœ€è¦è¨“ç·´ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ¥æ˜¯ç”¨ä¾†æ±ºç­–çš„ Agent Model ä»¥åŠç”¨ä¾†æä¾› global task knowledge èˆ‡ local state knowledge çš„ World Knowledge Modelã€‚æ¥è‘—æœƒè©³ç´°èªªæ˜å…©å€‹æ¨¡å‹çš„è¨“ç·´ã€‚

                                                  ä¸éå€¼å¾—ä¸€æçš„æ˜¯ï¼Œä½œè€…åœ¨è¨“ç·´å…©å€‹æ¨¡å‹éƒ½æ˜¯ç”¨ç›¸åŒçš„ Backboneï¼Œä¸¦ä¸”éƒ½æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ LoRA è€Œé Full Trainingã€‚

                                                  çµ¦å®š Expert Trajectories Dataset D\mathcal{D}D

                                                  Pknow(Au)=(pknow(Î±u(1)),pknow(Î±u(2)),â€¦,pknow(Î±u(âˆ£Auâˆ£))),âˆ‘i=1âˆ£Auâˆ£pknow(Î±u(i))=1pknow(Î±u(i))=NiN \begin{align*} P_{\text{know}}(\mathcal{A}_u) &= \left( p_{\text{know}}(\alpha_u^{(1)}), p_{\text{know}}(\alpha_u^{(2)}), \dots, p_{\text{know}}(\alpha_u^{(|\mathcal{A}_u|)}) \right), \sum_{i=1}^{|\mathcal{A}_u|}{p_{\text{know}}(\alpha_u^{(i)})} = 1 \\ p_{\text{know}}(\alpha_u^{(i)}) &= \frac{\mathcal{N}_i}{\mathcal{N}} \end{align*} Pknowâ€‹(Auâ€‹)pknowâ€‹(Î±u(i)â€‹)â€‹=(pknowâ€‹(Î±u(1)â€‹),pknowâ€‹(Î±u(2)â€‹),â€¦,pknowâ€‹(Î±u(âˆ£Auâ€‹âˆ£)â€‹)),i=1âˆ‘âˆ£Auâ€‹âˆ£â€‹pknowâ€‹(Î±u(i)â€‹)=1=NNiâ€‹â€‹â€‹

                                                  Pmodel(Au)=(pagent(Î±u(1)),pagent(Î±u(2)),â€¦,pagent(Î±u(âˆ£Auâˆ£))),âˆ‘i=1âˆ£Auâˆ£pagent(Î±u(i))=1 P_{\text{model}}(\mathcal{A}_u) = \left( p_{\text{agent}}(\alpha_u^{(1)}), p_{\text{agent}}(\alpha_u^{(2)}), \dots, p_{\text{agent}}(\alpha_u^{(|\mathcal{A}_u|)}) \right), \sum_{i=1}^{|\mathcal{A}_u|}{p_{\text{agent}}(\alpha_u^{(i)}) = 1} Pmodelâ€‹(Auâ€‹)=(pagentâ€‹(Î±u(1)â€‹),pagentâ€‹(Î±u(2)â€‹),â€¦,pagentâ€‹(Î±u(âˆ£Auâ€‹âˆ£)â€‹)),i=1âˆ‘âˆ£Auâ€‹âˆ£â€‹pagentâ€‹(Î±u(i)â€‹)=1

                                                  at+1=argmaxÎ±u(i)âˆˆAu,1â‰¤iâ‰¤âˆ£Auâˆ£(Î³â‹…pagent(Î±u(i))+(1âˆ’Î³)â‹…pknow(Î±u(i))) a_{t+1} = \underset{\alpha_u^{(i)} \in \mathcal{A}_u, 1 \leq i \leq |\mathcal{A}_u|}{\mathrm{argmax}}{\left( \gamma \cdot p_{\text{agent}}(\alpha_u^{(i)}) + (1 - \gamma) \cdot p_{\text{know}}(\alpha_u^{(i)}) \right)} at+1â€‹=Î±u(i)â€‹âˆˆAuâ€‹,1â‰¤iâ‰¤âˆ£Auâ€‹âˆ£argmaxâ€‹(Î³â‹…pagentâ€‹(Î±u(i)â€‹)+(1âˆ’Î³)â‹…pknowâ€‹(Î±u(i)â€‹))

                                                  # å¯¦é©—è¨­å®š

                                                  # Dataset èˆ‡ç’°å¢ƒ

                                                  å¯¦é©—åšåœ¨ä¸‰å€‹æ¨¡æ“¬çœŸå¯¦ä¸–ç•Œç’°å¢ƒçš„ datasets ä¸Šï¼Œåˆ†åˆ¥æ˜¯ ALFWorld, WebShop ä»¥åŠ ScienceWorldã€‚

                                                  ALFWorld

                                                  ä¸€å€‹åœ¨æˆ¿å­ç•¶ä¸­çš„ç’°å¢ƒï¼Œå¤§è‡´çš„ç›®æ¨™æ˜¯è¦åœ¨æˆ¿å­ç•¶ä¸­ç§»å‹•ï¼Œä¸¦ä¸”èˆ‡å„å¼ç‰©ä»¶äº’å‹•ã€‚

                                                  Image from ALFWorld: Aligning Text and Embodied Environments for Interactive Learningopen in new window

                                                  ä»¥ä¸Šé¢çš„åœ–ç‰‡ç‚ºä¾‹ï¼Œprompt å…§å®¹å¦‚ä¸‹ã€‚

                                                  é–‹å•Ÿ prompt å…§å®¹
                                                  You are in the middle of a room. Looking quickly around you, you see a drawer 2, a shelf 5, a drawer 1, a shelf 4, a sidetable 1, a drawer 5, a shelf 6, a shelf 1, a shelf 9, a cabinet 2, a sofa 1, a cabinet 1, a shelf 3, a cabinet 3, a drawer 3, a shelf 11, a shelf 2, a shelf 10, a dresser 1, a shelf 12, a garbagecan 1, a armchair 1, a cabinet 4, a shelf 7, a shelf 8, a safe 1, and a drawer 4. 

Your task is to: put some vase in safe. 

> go to shelf 6
You arrive at loc 4. On the shelf 6, you see a vase 2.

> take vase 2 from shelf 6
You pick up the vase 2 from the shelf 6.

> go to safe 1
You arrive at loc 3. The safe 1 is closed.

> open safe 1
You open the safe 1. The safe 1 is open. In it, you see a keychain 3.

> put vase 2 in/on safe 1
You won!
